## Welcome

This is the website for a four-hour workshop for R / Pharma 2020. In this workshop, we'll take you on a tour of how to get from data to manuscript using [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/). You'll learn:

+ The basics of [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) & [`knitr`](https://yihui.name/knitr/)
+ How to add tables for different outputs
+ Workflows for working with data
+ How to include and style graphics
